item.description:
Here is the camping info I promised for the weekend of adventure in Charlemont, MA at Zoar!!

If your not doing the rafting on Saturday or the Zip-lining on Sunday, your still welcome to join our group for the camping!!

We will be staying at Mohawk Park in Charlemont, MA. The campground is about 2.3 miles away from Zoar.

This campground has wooded, sunny as well as riverside sites. It has a restaurant with a full lunch and dinner menu. They also have a nightclub on the promises with weekend entertainment and I've been told it's a popular place with the locals. It was recommend to me by the people at Zoar.

Mohawk Park
559 Tea Street, Route 2
Mohawk Trail
(413)339-4470

It is located on Mohawk Trail (Route 2) From I-91 in Mass take exit 26 to Route 2 west. It's about 20 miles from Route 91 on the right.

They will be putting a block of sites aside for our group. Please let them know that you are with the Ivone and The Fun Single party and they will put you in our "block" or if all "our" sites are already taken, as close to us as possible.

I have booked my site from the afternoon of Friday, September 11th through the evening of Sunday, September 13th.

Please call them as soon as you can to book your site.

They charge by the tent not the site, the price is $30 per tent with a maximum of 4 people per tent.
item.how_to_find_us: Ask for the Fun Single or Ivone camp site
item.name: Camping weekend
